title: Google’s Travel site now lets you find hotels near specific sites, nearby car trips, more
content:
Google’s unified Travel site is adding a number of new features to help “plan your summer travel” across Flights, Hotels (including searching near specific sites), and the Explore capability.

more…

The post Google’s Travel site now lets you find hotels near specific sites, nearby car trips, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
